entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 4 May 2023
